attributes.action: Stop people withholding their telephone number when making a phone call.
attributes.additional_details:
The withholding of your phone number when making a call too easily allows people to make nuisance and/or criminal calls.  These withheld number calls are often to vulnerable people in society who may not know how to successfully deal with them.  Some of these calls go well beyond being a 'nuisance' and cause people genuine distress.

If you wish to speak to someone over the phone, you should be willing for the person being called to know your phone number.  Simple as that.
